title: Grateful Dead Live at Boston Garden on 1980-05-12
lineage: MAC > Re-shelled > Nakamichi DR-8 > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab 2448 > R8Brain > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC 16; Transfer by Andrew F.
source: Matrix 70% sbd/30% aud; Soundboard source: SBD > Cassette Master > Reel > Dat (48k); Transfer Info: Dat (Sony R500) > Sound Devices 744T > Samplitude Professional v10.02 > Cool Edit Pro v2.0 > FLAC; All Transfers and Mastering By Charlie Miller and Audience source: 2x Nakamichi CM300/CP1's > Sony TC-153SD > Maxell XLII's. Mics on stand, set up in center of upper balcony behind the stage, mics pointed at rear-facing P.A. Taped by Tim Friend.
